name: Arabella
description: Arabella, designed by Fabrizia Scassellati, was inspired by Roberto Lazzeroni's work 'With a little help from my friends'. It features North American walnut wood and veneered plywood, a central drawer, and side rotating drawers providing ample storage space. Later transformed into a dressing table showcasing a luxurious side, the fold-up tabletop reveals a mirror and a wooden partition, maintaining the side rotating drawers.
